docs.lead_paragraph: For one day, at least, battered bank stocks actually helped the markets. Reports that the government was considering a deal to set up a ''bad bank'' to absorb toxic assets ignited a broad rally on Wednesday, with financial companies leading the way. It was Wall Street's third consecutive day of gains, which reached across all sectors.

headline.main: Financials Rally on Hopes for 'Bad Bank'
